mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue( id, createTime, createBy, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address )values( #{id}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on c.owner=u.id
and c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.source=#{source}
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and c.state=#{state}
mapper.update: update tbl_clue set fullname=#{fullname}, appellation=#{appellation}, owner=#{owner}, company=#{company}, job=#{job}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, website=#{website}, mphone=#{mphone}, state=#{state}, source=#{source}, description=#{description}, contactSummary=#{contactSummary}, nextContactTime=#{nextContactTime}, address=#{address}, editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*) as value,source as name from tbl_clue group by source;
